```{r functions, include=FALSE}
get_content <- function(x) {
  if(grepl(x = x, pattern = '<img')) {
    return(html_attr(x, "data-canonical-src")) 
  } else {
    return(html_text(x))
  }
}

```

```{r parse, include=FALSE}
url <- 'https://github.com/rladies/starter-kit/blob/master/Current-Chapters.md'
r <- read_html(url) %>%
    html_node('.file') %>%
    html_nodes('a > img, h2, h3, strong, li')

content <- tibble(
    content = r  %>% map(get_content)
  ) %>%
  filter(!grepl(x = content, pattern = 'twitter')) %>%
  filter(!grepl(x = content, pattern = 'facebook')) %>% 
  filter(!grepl(x = content, pattern = 'email')) %>%
  slice(5:n()) 

```

```{r}
# read the page where the list of chapters is located
page <- read_html("https://github.com/rladies/starter-kit/blob/master/Current-Chapters.md")
# Countries: get the countries of the chapters ----------------------------
countries <- page %>% 
  html_nodes("ul+ h2 , p+ h2") %>% 
  html_text() 
countries <- countries[!grepl("Remote", countries)]
countries
```
